synopsis.native: Sei storie per raccontare un tema fondamentale: l’infanzia. Sei storie, ambientate in sei decenni diversi dagli anni ’50 ad oggi, che si legano l’un l’altra attraverso un filo rosso che verrà svelato solo nell’ultimo episodio. Queste sono le nostre storie: una finale di campionato da vincere, una piccolo mistero familiare da risolvere, una missione speciale da compiere, un consiglio da seguire, un segreto da confessare.
synopsis.english: Six stories to recount a fundamental theme: childhood. Six stories, set in six different decades, from the years ' 50 to date, which bind each other through a common thread that will be revealed in the last episode, when Claudio, a 14-year-old aspiring filmmaker, decides to ask his relatives to tell him the moment they realized they were growing up. These are our stories: a championship game to be won, a small family mystery to solve, a special mission to fulfill, some advice to follow, a secret to confess. Six stories told with tenderness and sensitivity needed to involve everyone, young and old.
